name: MachRace
description: MachRace is an addicing, intense casual survival racer being developed by a single developer using Unreal Engine. Intense and absurdly fast Machrace tests your instincts and reaction time against impossible odds.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2 GHz+ Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 + DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
